title: Ratchet & Clank - Trailer
text: Ratchet & Clank - Trailer Reported by Outsiders - 2015.10.16 The first trailer for the new animated adventure movie "Ratchet & Clank" has hit our galaxy. The upcoming film is based on the popular Sony Playstation games, which features a furry mechanic named Ratchet and his little robot companion called Clank, who travel the universe to battle evil wherever it hides. The film will tell an origin story where a young Ratchet (voiced by James Arnold Taylor) tries to get recruited by Captain Qwark (Jim Ward) to join The Galactic Rangers to help fight against an evil armada out to destroy their world. After being rejected by his hero, Ratchet runs into a sentient Robot called Clank (David Kaye) who is carrying a secret message for the Rangers to help warn them of an approaching attack. Now the two new friends must take their first steps in becoming heroes ... or better yet, legends. Ratchet & Clank star the voices of James Arnold Taylor, David Kaye, Jim Ward, Paul Giamatti, John Goodman, Bella Thorne, Rosario Dawson, Armin Shimerman, Sylvester Stallone Release: April 29th, 2016
